name: Off The Rails!
description:
DISCLAIMER: The game was made for use with Oculus Touch, so might not work correctly (if at all) on other Virtual Reality headsets or without Oculus Touch, the final product will hopefully be optimized for multiple platforms.

This game is an idea I have had for a while, and began work on starting in the summer of 2019. This version of the game is a demo of the first "arcade machine", there will be more arcade machines added later on, with different scenarios and themes. The finished product will start the player in an arcade room full of light-gun machines, and once the player starts one of the machines they will be transported into the game world.
